patthana1.17:8.1: Maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.17:8.2: maggārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana1.17:9.1: Maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.17:9.2: maggārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho.
patthana1.17:10.1: Maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.17:10.2: maggārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #3

patthana1.17:11.2: maggahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1

patthana1.17:22.2: maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca maggahetukā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1

patthana1.17:23.2: maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #2

patthana1.17:24.2: maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca maggahetukā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #3
patthana1.17:26.1: Maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā …
patthana1.17:29.1: Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe adhipatiyā anantare samanantare sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye upanissaye purejāte āsevane kamme āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate sattarasa.
patthana1.17:34.1: Maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.17:34.2: ahetukaṃ maggārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana1.17:36.1: Maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.17:36.2: maggārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana1.17:37.1: Maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.17:37.2: maggārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #2
patthana1.17:38.1: Maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.17:38.2: maggārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #3
patthana1.17:39.1: Maggahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.17:40.1: Maggahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.17:41.1: Maggahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.17:41.2: maggahetuke khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca adhipati. #3
patthana1.17:42.1: Maggādhipatiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.17:42.3: Maggādhipatiṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana1.17:43.1: Maggādhipatiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.17:43.2: maggādhipatiṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #2
patthana1.17:44.1: Maggādhipatiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.17:45.1: Maggādhipatiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.17:45.2: maggādhipatiṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #4

patthana1.17:46.2: maggādhipatī khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca adhipati. #5

patthana1.17:47.2: maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1

patthana1.17:49.1: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.17:49.2: maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #3
patthana1.17:50.1: Maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṃ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.17:50.2: maggahetuke ca maggādhipatī ca khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko adhipati. #1

patthana1.17:51.2: maggahetuke ca maggādhipatī ca khandhe paṭicca maggādhipati adhipati. #2

patthana1.17:52.2: maggahetuke ca maggādhipatī ca khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca adhipati. #3
patthana1.17:54.1: Maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā …
patthana1.17:56.1: Maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā—
patthana1.17:56.2: maggārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1

patthana1.17:58.2: maggārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #3

patthana1.17:59.2: maggādhipatiṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1

patthana1.17:62.2: maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana1.17:63.1: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṃ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā—
patthana1.17:63.2: maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #2
patthana1.17:64.1: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naāsevanapaccayā—
patthana1.17:64.2: maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #3
patthana1.17:66.1: Maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.17:67.1: Maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.17:68.1: Maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.17:68.2: maggārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipati ca cetanā. #3
patthana1.17:69.1: Maggahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.17:70.1: Maggahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.17:71.1: Maggahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.17:71.2: maggahetuke khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca cetanā. #3
patthana1.17:72.1: Maggādhipatiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.17:73.1: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā.
patthana1.17:74.1: Maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṃ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā.
patthana1.17:76.1: Maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā.
patthana1.17:78.1: Maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati namaggapaccayā—
patthana1.17:78.2: ahetukaṃ maggārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana1.17:80.1: Maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā.
patthana1.17:83.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā sattarasa, napurejāte sattarasa, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane nava, nakamme sattarasa, navipāke sattarasa, namagge ekaṃ, navippayutte sattarasa.
patthana1.17:87.1: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā sattarasa, napurejāte sattarasa, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane nava, nakamme sattarasa, navipāke navippayutte sattarasa.
patthana1.17:91.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ … pe … jhāne sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate ekaṃ.
patthana1.17:99.1: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.17:99.2: maggārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.17:100.1: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.17:100.2: maggārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ maggādhipatīnaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.17:101.1: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:103.1: Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.17:103.2: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, cetopariyañāṇena maggahetukacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti, maggahetukā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.17:104.1: Maggahetuko dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.17:104.2: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti. #2
patthana1.17:105.1: Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.17:105.2: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti. #3
patthana1.17:106.1: Maggādhipati dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.17:106.2: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti. #1
patthana1.17:107.1: Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.17:107.2: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, cetopariyañāṇena maggādhipaticittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti, maggādhipatī khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.17:108.1: Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.17:108.2: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti. #3
patthana1.17:109.1: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.17:109.2: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, cetopariyañāṇena maggahetukamaggādhipaticittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti, maggahetukā ca maggādhipatī ca khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.17:110.1: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggādhipatissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.17:110.2: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti. #2
patthana1.17:111.1: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.17:111.2: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti. #3
patthana1.17:113.1: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:114.1: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:114.3: maggārammaṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ maggādhipatīnaṃ khandhānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.17:115.1: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:115.3: maggārammaṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ maggārammaṇānañca maggādhipatīnañca khandhānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.17:116.1: Maggahetuko dhammo maggahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.17:169.1: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.17:169.2: purimā purimā maggārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ maggārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:170.1: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:170.2: (Anantarasadisaṃ. Nava pañhā kātabbā, āvajjanā na kātabbā.)
patthana1.17:172.1: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.17:174.1: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo … jhānapaccayena paccayo … maggapaccayena paccayo … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … atthipaccayena paccayo (ime satta paccayā sattarasa pañhā hetusadisā) …
patthana1.17:177.1: Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekavīsa, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe sattarasa, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye ekavīsa, āsevane nava, kamme sattarasa, āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte sattarasa, atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate sattarasa.
patthana1.17:180.1: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1

patthana1.17:204.1: Nahetuyā ekavīsa, naārammaṇe sattarasa (naārammaṇe gahite pakatārammaṇampi upanissayārammaṇampi dvepi chijjanti), naadhipatiyā ekavīsa, naanantare nasamanantare nasahajāte naaññamaññe nanissaye naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge nasampayutte navippayutte noatthiyā nonatthiyā novigate noavigate ekavīsa.
patthana1.17:208.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe sattarasa, naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge navippayutte nonatthiyā novigate sattarasa.
patthana1.17:212.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekavīsa, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe sattarasa, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye ekavīsa, āsevane nava, kamme sattarasa, āhāre sattarasa, indriye jhāne magge sampayutte sattarasa, atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate sattarasa.
